p: Among the selected studies, 3 RCTs [ 7– 9] and 12 non-RCTs [ 10, 16– 26] compared treatment started in the third trimester versus control, 7 non-RCTs compared the timing of second trimester versus control [ 27– 33], 3 non-RCTs compared first trimester versus control [ 14, 34, 35], 4 non-RCTs compared second and third trimester versus control respectively [ 11, 36– 38], 3 non-RCTs compared first, second trimester versus control respectively [ 39– 41]; 2 non-RCTs compared first, third trimester versus control respectively [ 12, 42], 1 non-RCTs compared first, second trimester, third trimester versus control respectively [ 13]. No randomized controlled trials were conducted for the treatment that was applied during first or second trimester except for several non-RCTs.
